verbose_text: The well characterized CD34 + CD38 + human bone marrow derived hematopoietic progenitor cell line TF-1 was used as a model to investigate the effects of the mu-opioid receptor specific peptide DAMGO (D-Ala2, N-Me-Phe4, Gly5-ol-enkephalin) on CXCR4 expression as well as infection of undifferentiated human hematopoietic progenitor cells.
